data.title: Company Overview & News
data.meta_description: NetSuite, Inc. engages in the provision of cloud-based business management application suites. The company provides cloud-based financials and enterprise
data.text:
America’s Best Midsize Employers 2024: The Top 100

More than 170,000 workers in the U.S. were surveyed and asked whether or not they would recommend their employer. These companies came out ahead of the pack in this year's ranking.

America’s Best Large Employers 2024: The Top 100

More than 170,000 U.S.-based workers rated their employers in our survey. These 100 companies landed at the very top of the resulting ranking.

The (Very) Emerging Role Of AI In The Accounting Industry

From EY to PwC and Netsuite to Oracle the accounting tech industry are working on amazing AI offerings. But there's more work to do.

Oracle NetSuite Aims To Help Businesses Achieve A Quantum Leap In Productivity

#1-Ranked Industry Analyst Patrick Moorhead highlights key announcements and insights at SuiteWorld 2023.

NetSuite’s AP Automation Is A Powerful And Important Step In Its SuiteBanking Vision

#1-Ranked Industry Analyst Patrick Moorhead covers what NetSuite announced with its SuitBanking AP Automation and SuiteWorld 2022.

Oracle NetSuite In A Sweet Spot For Growing Businesses: The Scoop From SuiteWorld 2021

#1-Ranked dives in as NetSuite shared some impactful customer testimonials and launched a series of new products at SuiteWorld. He had the chance to catch up with NetSuite executives Evan Goldberg (co-founder) and Jason Maynard, which helped provide depth and context.

Meet Another Freelance Innovator: OdeCloud, A NetSuite Expert Community

Meet OdeCloud, a strong startup building a Netsuite expert community.

Enterprise Software Expert Reimagines Oracle+NetSuite Guides As A Mystery Novel

The Vester Group Founder Releases “The Big Commitment” with ForbesBooks

Oracle Extends All-In Commitment To AI And Machine Learning To NetSuite SaaS Apps

Racing to close the gap with SaaS leader Salesforce.com, Oracle is doubling down on AI and machine learning as the next-gen tools that will help the many tens of thousands of businesses using Oracle's core SaaS apps or those of Oracle NetSuite make better decisions and thrive in the digital economy.

Oracle

BRANDVOICE | Paid Program

NetSuite And Oracle: It Started With A Shared Vision Of A Cloud Future

Evan Goldberg, founder of NetSuite, talks about his long history with Oracle and what Oracle's acquisition of NetSuite means for customers.

How NetSuite Quietly Built A Social Impact Program That Roars

As someone who had long worked in open source communities, Geilhufe knew that one of the best ways that a tech company could help a nonprofit achieve its mission is by applying next generation solutions to the old-school challenges for nonprofits.

Oracle

BRANDVOICE | Paid Program

A Lingerie Merchant And A Doorbell Inventor Walk Into A Room: A NetSuite Story

Smaller companies, which have less margin for error than companies with deeper pockets, depend on cloud ERP technology to help them pursue unique strategies.

NetSuite Enters Oversold Territory (N)

Legendary investor Warren Buffett advises to be fearful when others are greedy, and be greedy when others are fearful. One way we can try to measure the level of fear in a given stock is through a technical analysis indicator called the Relative Strength Index, or RSI, which measures momentum [...]
